title: Worst Meal of the Year
body: Goodness sakes oh me oh my! I don't care how much dark chocolate is in, it should never be reduced and put on brocolli!

title: Join Me in Welcoming Gillian Anderson to the Team
body: Gillian brings to us a diverse background in paranormal research, therapy and dealing with difficult adults.

title: I Only Drink Tea
body: I'm giving up water! Too mainstream. Did you know that even plants drink it? Do I look like a plant?

title: I Made a Huge Mistake
body: So...apparently you aren't supposed to heat up lettuce. This would have been nice to know prior to microwaving and entire head of romaine!

title: California
body: I think that's a state but wanted to put my feelers out there in case any of you can verify.

title: The Time is Now
body: Enough is enough. It's time to see if Twinkies actually expire.
